data.text: @janekrubes @DanielMajid Hi, I gladly inform you that we as an airline do not ask for a PCR Test to board the aircraft unless this is required upon entry. In this case, our colleagues will have to check it prior to departure. You can also check the information here https://t.co/qF14GdXBgT. Kind regards
@sangers Hi, we just replied to your DM. Kind regards, Sara

data.text: @starlaxy @HeathrowAirport @3M Hi Elisabeth, have a safe flight home, and happy holidays! Best regards, Sarah

@DanielMajid Hi Daniel, if you have any inquiries about the latest travel regulations for your flight route, we ask you to keep yourself informed up to the day of departure by visiting https://t.co/kW6WNoXSuO or by contacting the relevant authorities in your home country.
Best regards, Sarah
@IRudolfsson Hi Isa, please DM us your reference ID and we'll have a closer look at your claim status. Kind regards, James
@varun_nahata Hi Varun, I just replied to you via DM. Kind regards, Sarah
@esthery Hi, yes of course you can check-in directly at the airport if you have all the required documents. We are looking forward to welcoming you on board soon. Kind regards, Sarah

@kirstenpritcha4 Hi Kirsten, we are sorry for any frustration and would like to apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please send us your booking code in a DM and advise how exactly we can assist you. Kind regards, Chris
@mweissbacher Hi Michael, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@gilldanish Hi there, please get back to us before your planned departure. Kind regards, Chris

@forumDS Hi, es tut uns leid zu hören, dass du Schwierigkeiten mit dem Check-in hattest. Bitte sende uns den Buchungscode in einer DM damit wir uns das genauer ansehen können. Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@furberliz Hi Liz, thank you for your kind feedback. We will gladly forward it to our responsible colleagues. Kind regards, Chris

data.text:
This week we received our first 100% electric car for our HON Circle limousine service at @flughafen_wien. The #PorscheTaycan completes our HON fleet of 4 vehicles, 2 of them being Porsche E-Hybrids. Our goal? Decarbonizing all of our HON rides in Vienna!🚗♻️
 
We #makechangefly! https://t.co/iHpsH8q9G4
@gummibaat Hi Marvin, gerne kannst du unsere Schalter ab 3 Stunden vor Abflug kontaktieren. Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@kployalq Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @sp72202848 Hi, we are sorry for any frustration caused. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests.Kind regards, Chris
@stranded4u Hi there, if you already received a mail from us we kindly ask you to reply directly back to that mail regarding any additional questions. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris

@gummibaat Hi Marvin, gerne kannst du deine Dokumente im Voraus hochladen https://t.co/qxsx0dGxbi  Die Gepäckaufgabe kann jedoch nur direkt bei unserem Check-in Schalter am Flughafen und nicht bei anderen Airlines erfolgen. Vielen Dank für dein Verständnis. Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@flughafen_wien #ZusammenGegenCorona ❤️🤍❤️

data.text: @sud_rach @lufthansa Hi there, I have already replied to your other message. Kind regards, Derya
@dynamicdhiraj @Miilan2010 Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your inquiry with your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: @MochaSuper Hi there,  we are happy to hear that you are travelling with us next year. The baggage through check in depends on your ticket. If all your flights are booked together it will be possible to check them through and of course also by considering the customs clearance at destination
@Miilan2010 Hi Milan, thank you for reaching out. How can we assist you, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@ViceconNikenza Hi, we are very sorry that you haven't got an answer yet. We will forward your case with a note of urgency to our colleagues from feedback department. Please have a little more patience, our colleagues will definitely come back to you as soon as possible. Best regards, Susi
@gilldanish Hi, please send us the booking reference and the new travel dates. I hope your son get well soon! Kind regards, Karin
@rasanya12 Hi, please DM us your booking code and we'll have a closer look at your request. Kind regards, James

@spencerrutherf4 Hi Spencer, is there anything we can assist you with? If you are referring to an already existing reservation, please send us the booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@cyberalexi Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@dynamicdhiraj Hi, our colleagues will get back to you asap. We apologize for the inconvenience. Kind regards, Sara
@varun_nahata Hi, please send us your booking reference or your ticket number in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Best regards, Susi
@parkrunclare Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM and your new travel dates so that we can have a closer look. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine
@SBerdyna Hi there, please send us a DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana
@solervi Hi, wir möchten uns bei dir für die Stornierung entschuldigen. Bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode in einer DM damit wir dir weiterhelfen können. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@Radu_Sora Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@jdotslade Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine

@dynamicdhiraj Hi, We just retrieved your mail. It has already been forwarded to our responsible department. Due to the high volume of requests, it is not possible to process all of them within the usual time limits. Please be assured that all requests are being answered. Kind regards, Chris

@KarrinkaS Hi there, we regret to hear that you have difficulties to reach us. Due to the current situation our lines are very busy. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We will be happy to have a closer look. Kind regards, Sara
@thisguise Hi there, please send us your booking code and you new required flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

data.text:
Ein kurzes "AUA" gegen Corona. 

#ServusImpfung #ZusammenGegenCorona #WeCare https://t.co/sUQCdwsYDc

@PompeyGoat Hi Pete, we regret to hear that you have difficulties to reach us. Due to the current situation our lines are busy. 
Please send us your booking code in a DM. We will be happy to have a closer look. Kind regards, Sara
@ErichSlowak Hallo Erich, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hast uns zu erreichen. Bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode in einer DM. Wir sehen uns das gerne für dich an.  LG Sara

@datenfussel Hallo Felix, wir halten uns an die allgemein gültigen Einreisebestimmungen. Also, wenn die Impfung für die Einreise reicht, benötigst du keinen zusätzlichen Test um borden zu können. LG Sara

@instigardo Hi Himanshu, thank you for reaching out. I am sorry that we couldn´t respond to your message any earlier. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly have a closer look at it. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@PaulineLegrand_ Hi Pauline, please send us your booking code in a DM, so we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Sarah

@WarthongsZ Hi Daniel, all customers are asked to take account of currently valid entry regulations at their respective destinations when planning their journeys. For further information regarding entry regulations please contact the immigration authorities directly. Kind regards, Chris

@keithah Hi Keith, thank you for reaching out. Unfortunately, due to the increased number of emails, our colleagues are confronted with, the average processing time can´t be met. We are very sorry for this. Please send us your booking code and your new date of travel in a DM. Kind regards
@koyemari Hi there, plase send us DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana
@dynamicdhiraj Hi there, please send us your mail address in a DM so we can check if your request has been received by our system. Kind regards, Chris

@PaXeCo290 Hi, we are sorry for the inconvenience. If your booked seat category is not available we will of course refund the amount paid. Please complete the “​Seat reservation – refund” form. https://t.co/XAwFPliwbF. Kind regards, Christine
@kangaris92 @opodo Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine

@Odinson46736790 Hi, according to information from the Ministery of Health, international travel is still possible despite the exit restrictions in Austria. There were adaptions in flight operations but if your flight was cancelled you should have been already informed. Best regards, Susi
@consultilands Hi Chris, please send us a DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana
@meiriontodd Hi there, please send us a DM with your booking code. Kind regards, Ivana

data.text: @European_Bird Hi there, there's wifi on some of our Airbus fleet. Kind regards, Ivana

Their home is the hangar ✈ 

Whether in maintenance or in the field of material & logistics: #AustrianAirlines’ background heroes ensure that 🇦🇹 stays connected with the 🌎 and that our aircraft are always at the safest level.  

Happy #InternationalCivilAviationDay! 👩🔧👨 https://t.co/YIWZKGcr1F

@BeneZd Hi Bénédicte, thank you for reaching out. You can apply for the flight value voucher here https://t.co/zNwhn4fVJM. 
Please mind reading the information on this page to see whether you are entitled to apply for the voucher. Have a nice day. Kind regards, Derya

data.text: @meiriontodd @ExpediaUK Hi Meirion, thank you for reaching out. If you have booked your flights through a travel agency and your flights are being operated as scheduled, please, in this case, get in contact with your travel agency in order to get them changed. Kind regards, Derya
@consultilands Hi Chris, I am sorry that you had to wait so long.We currently have a lot of calls again. We can only ask you to try it again a bit later. Kind regards, Christine
@WillFolker Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM. We will be happy to have a closer look. Kind regards, Sara

data.text: @juliancaddy @uk_caa @abtatravel Hi, which flight do you prefer? Please send us the exact date and time. Kind regards, Karin

@lucycolleer Hi Lucy, we kindly ask for your patience as you will be contacted soon. Our respective colleagues are doing their utmost to get back to you asap. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, James

@PozzoNYC Hi Alfonso, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. You can also check the status of your reservation anytime on our homepage via "My Bookings" Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @JulianCaddy @UK_CAA @ABTAtravel Hi Julian, please DM us your booking code and we'll check your request in more detail. Kind regards, James

@Steve_Austria07 Hi Steve, bei eurer folgenden Buchung VVERZ8 wurdet ihr aufgrund einer Flugstornierung auf den Flug OS435, am 23.4.2022 umgebucht. Bei der Buchung RMPTEJ seid ihr auf den Flug OS434, am 20.6.2022 umgebucht worden. Bitte entschuldige die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten. LG, James
@5_years_project Hi Jonathan, Due to the current situation all our service channels are very busy, unfortunately. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@RNorridge Hi Robbie, please send us the reference number of your claim in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@AlexanderEldred Hi Alex, please send us your booking code in a DM in order to have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine

@ZemanNatalia Hi Natalia, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties with your document upload. If you have not been able to complete the process in the meantime please contact our desk at the airport for a documents check. Our colleagues will be happy to assist. Kind regards, Chris
@Steve_Austria07 Hi Steve, das ist nicht korrekt. Alle 3 Personen sind auf den selben Flug, OS435, gebucht. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@GreekFilele @staralliance Hi, we regret to read that you are not able to reach us via phone. Please send us your booking code in a DM so that we are able to have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @MalmstromCajsa Hi Cajsa, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding a possible refund: https://t.co/qtHWqUZJ9O Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris
@pameclar62 Hi Paulina, please be informed that we offer flights to/from various destinations in Austria. However, the direct flight to Cancun is only operating from Vienna. Kind regards, Chris

data.text:
The fueling of 1,500 tons of SAF will save around 3,750 tons of CO2, which corresponds to the emissions of 333 flights Vienna-London!

We are grateful for our costumers’ commitment to finance the use of #SAF via #COMPENSAID!
👉https://t.co/urqjGC41SM
👉 https://t.co/sJGtUhveoV

Austrian Airlines takes off to CO2-neutrality!♻️✈️

We are more than proud to announce our first delivery of Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) from @omv! Starting March 2022, we can finally connect Austria with the world AND reduce our CO2-emissions. 
 
#MakeChangeFly https://t.co/TuxEaLKYjA

@lucycolleer Hi, We just retrieved your mail and noticed that it has already been forwarded to our responsible department. Please be assured that our colleagues try their utmost to get back to everyone as fast as possible. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris
@Steve_Austria07 Hi Steve, gerne haben wir uns die Buchung angesehen. Alle Personen, auch das Baby, sind hier auf den selben Flug gebucht. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @mrsla69 Hi there, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding a possible refund: https://t.co/qtHWqUZJ9O Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris
@melilla Hi Melilla, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris
@PeterGrasch Hi Peter, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane

@mon_sherry Hi Sherry, we can't tell you a specific time of response. All our channels are very busy so getting back to you takes time. We are working on every inquiry one by one and will get back to you asap. Best regards, Christiane
@El_4_a Hi there, regarding the current entry and transit regulations kindly contact the respective authorities directly. Best regards, Christiane
@BiBiKei Hi there, sorry you are having troubles using the web form. Did you try a different browser? Maybe on a Laptop instead a phone? Kind regards, Ivana

@Al_Nagler Lieber Alexander, es tut uns sehr leid aber all unsere Kanäle gehen mit Anfragen über. Sollten wir etwas für dich tun können, sende uns bitte eine DM mit deinem Buchungscode. Liebe Grüße, Ivana
@Candice97852163 Hi there, please send us a DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana
@IbbStanzio Hi there, please send us a DM with your booking code and/or your ticket number. Kind regards, Ivana

data.text:
Off to the Caribbean! 🛫🌴

Starting 25 January, we add to our Cancún service with an additional weekly flight. During winter, we will fly directly from Vienna to the sunny Mexican holiday destination every Tuesday, Thursday and Sunday!

👉 https://t.co/cRv3xZhh6d https://t.co/HVQsa0zmX9

data.text: @dancingoffica [2/2] we still offer our customers that it can be changed against half of the usual rebooking fee. This is already a goodwill solution from our side due to Corona. In addition, you can also add travel insurance to your booking.Kind regards, Christine

@dancingoffica Hi Annabell [1/2] , we offer different fares (refundable, non refundable, free of charge changeable or changeable against a fee) and even though that an Economy Light fare usually is non-changeable,
@Sbo921 Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine

@mcpross Hi, I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. I can assure you that we are in full commitment for you and we are doing everything so that we can quickly offer you our usual service again. Kind regards, Christine
